sub_categories.bottom_content: Looking for lip liner? We’re here to help. Our lip liners and lip pencils help fill, define, and enhance any lip look.
sub_categories.name: Lip Liner

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Sephora Favorites - Give Me Some Lip & Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A multibranded sampler set of perfectly paired lipsticks and liners—all in a giftable, collectible box.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: NARS - Velvet Matte Lip Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: Combining the convenience of a pencil with the application of a lipstick in a jumbo-sized crayon design, these pigment-rich sticks provide a matte, creamy finish that will not dry the lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: MAKE UP FOR EVER - Aqua Lip Waterproof Lipliner Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A lip liner collection with an extensive array of creamy, long-lasting, and waterproof formulas to customize lip looks.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Urban Decay - 24/7 Glide-On Lip Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A creamy, 24-hour wear lip pencil that lines and primes lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Huda Beauty - Lip Contour Matte Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A line of easy-glide contouring and filling lip pencils featuring intense color payoff and a matte finish.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Benefit Cosmetics - They're Real! BIG sexy lip kit

products.display_name: They're Real! BIG sexy lip kit
products.quick_look_desc: A set of four silky-smooth lipsticks with dual-hued tips to visibly line, fill, and boost the fullness of lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: NARS - Velvet Lip Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A long-lasting lip liner that defines lips with precise, pigment-rich color depth while it frames, fills, and prevents feathering.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: SEPHORA COLLECTION - Lip Liner To Go

products.quick_look_desc: A mini lip liner available in shades to match SEPHORA COLLECTION's lipstick colors.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: SEPHORA COLLECTION - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A retractable lip liner with a long-lasting, gel-cream texture to enhance the lip contour.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Bobbi Brown - Art Stick

products.quick_look_desc: A two-in-one color in an on-the-go package that delivers a punch of color to lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: stila - Stay All Day® Lip Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A waterproof, long-lasting, richly pigmented, creamy lip liner with a semi-matte finish.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Smashbox - Always Sharp Lip Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A long-wearing, water-resistant lip liner that self-sharpens every time you twist off the cap.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Marc Jacobs Beauty - Poutliner Longwear Lip Liner Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A collagen-infused, long-wear gel lip liner pencil.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: CLINIQUE - Quickliner for Lips

products.quick_look_desc: A rich lip liner that defines with ease—no sharpening required.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Laura Mercier - Lip Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A perfectly textured, wooden lip liner pencil designed to outline, define, and enhance the natural shape of lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Lancôme - LE LIPSTIQUE - Lip Colouring Stick with Brush

products.display_name: LE LIPSTIQUE - Lip Colouring Stick with Brush
products.quick_look_desc: Two tools in one: a soft, creamy, waterproof pencil for gorgeous, professional-looking lips on one end; and a brush for blending on the other.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Urban Decay - Ultimate Ozone Multipurpose Primer Pencil

products.quick_look_desc:
What it is:
A clear, creamy, and long-lasting primer pencil with a thick barrel.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: Bobbi Brown - Lip Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A lip pencil that goes on soft and smooth, and stays put for hours. It's long-wearing and non-drying, applies smoothly and evenly, and helps reduce feathering. Each liner includes a sharpener.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: SEPHORA COLLECTION - Beauty Amplifier Universal Lip Liner

products.quick_look_desc: A colorless, long-lasting waterproof lip liner that prevents lipstick from feathering.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: MAKE UP FOR EVER - High Precision Lip Pencil

derived_sku.image_alt_text: KEVYN AUCOIN - The Flesh Tone Lip Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A lip pencil that glides on smoothly and evenly for perfectly defined lips.

derived_sku.image_alt_text: NUDESTIX - Lip + Cheek Pencil

products.quick_look_desc: A long-lasting, multitasking pencil that delivers natural-looking coverage and ultra-creamy, soft color and liner for cheeks and lips.

products.display_name: GEN NUDE™ Under Over™ Lip Liner
